sentences.sContent: What happens to systems not under the control of the synchronization service?
sentences.sContent_eng: What happens to systems not under the control of the synchronization service?
sentences.sCn: 系统不在同步服务的控制范围内，会发生什么？

sentences.sContent: This is a good alternative if your objective is to eliminate synchronization.
sentences.sContent_eng: This is a good alternative if your objective is to eliminate synchronization.
sentences.sCn: 如果您的目标是消除同步，则这将是一个很好的选择。

sentences.sContent: My next step is to wire them up using a common channel as a shared synchronization mechanism and then kick each one off.
sentences.sContent_eng: My next step is to wire them up using a common channel as a shared synchronization mechanism and then kick each one off.
sentences.sCn: 下一步就是使用一个用作共享同步机制的公共通道把它们联系在一起，然后从中剔除一个进程。

phrases.pCn: 数据同步；数据同步设计
